hero.title: Master German with <primary>expert</primary> tutors
hero.description: Connect with certified German tutors and achieve your language goals Whether you're preparing for Goethe, TELC, or TestDaF, our personalized approach ensures your success.

certified.title: Certified Tutors
certified.desc: All tutors are verified, with teaching qualifications and native-level fluency.

exam.title: Exam Prep
exam.desc: Specialized preparation for Goethe, TELC, TestDaF, and DSH exams.

oneOnOne.title: 1-on-1 Lessons
oneOnOne.desc: Personalized lessons tailored to your learning style and goals.

flexible.title: Flexible Schedule
flexible.desc: Book lessons at times that work for you, 7 days a week.

features1.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features1.description: Our platform provides all the tools you need to learn German effectively and prepare for your certification exams.

matching.title: Smart Tutor Matching
matching.desc: Find the perfect tutor based on your level, goals, schedule, and budget Filter by specialization, availability, and ratings.

chat.title: Real-time Chat
chat.desc: Communicate directly with tutors through our built-in messaging system Discuss your goals and schedule lessons easily.

booking.title: Easy Booking
booking.desc: Book lessons with just a few clicks View tutor availability in real-time and reschedule when needed.

reviews.title: Verified Reviews
reviews.desc: Read authentic reviews from other students Make informed decisions based on real experiences.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.desc: Pay safely through our platform Money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with your first lesson.

anywhere.title: Learn Anywhere
anywhere.desc: Take lessons from anywhere in the world All you need is an internet connection and a device.

howItWorks1.title: How G-Teach Works
howItWorks1.subtitle: Get started in four simple steps and begin your German learning journey today.

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.desc: Sign up for free and complete your profile Tell us about your current level and learning goals.

step2.title: Find Your Tutor
step2.desc: Browse our tutors, filter by specialization, read reviews, and find the perfect match for your needs.

step3.title: Connect & Discuss
step3.desc: Send a message to introduce yourself Discuss your goals and schedule a trial lesson.

step4.title: Start Learning
step4.desc: Book your lessons and start your journey to German fluency with personalized instruction.

examPrep.title: Prepare for Official German Exams
examPrep.description: Our tutors specialize in preparing students for all major German language certifications Achieve your target score with expert guidance.

goethe.description: The most recognized German language certificate worldwide.

telc.description: European Language Certificates recognized by employers and institutions.

testdaf.description: Required for university admission in Germany.

examPrep.title: Prepare for Official German Exams

goethe.description: The most recognized German language certificate worldwide.

telc.description: European Language Certificates recognized by employers and institutions.

testdaf.description: Required for university admission in Germany.

ecl.description: An internationally recognized European language certificate focused on practical communication skills.
features: Balanced skills training (Speaking, Writing, Listening, Reading)

osd.description: An Austrian state-recognized German language certificate accepted for study, work, and residence purposes.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your German Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of students who have achieved their German language goals with G-Teach Your first lesson comes with a satisfaction guarantee.

footer.description: Connect with expert German tutors and achieve your language goals Prepare for Goethe, TELC, TestDaF, and more.
